name: Dream Sweepers
description:
Dream Sweepers is a game for the Mini Jam 105.

In Dream Sweepers you play as a Dream Sweeper, a professional tasked with eliminating the nightmares of victim's dreams. Fight against common fears such as clowns and snakes! 

Will you be able to defeat the nightmares?

This is my first game jam / first game. I learned a lot from this experience. Feel free to leave feedback.

CONTROLS: 

Move - WASD

Attack - Arrow Keys

Restart Game - R
